Html:
Hi,
it will be very useful if we can make the logo in modernwindow clickable by Handling an icommand interface.

I think on a shopping cart logo (enabled/disable it if cart is not empty) or it may be useful for login/logout purposes or even more to show user's profile data (I can put user's avatar into logodata).
Sounds like a fair request. Care to create an issue for it in the issue list?
